summary.span: オブジェクトの順序付きコレクションを表します。

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks から派生するすべてのオブジェクトには、という名前の があります。All objects that derive from have an named . から派生するすべてのオブジェクトには、という名前の があります。All objects that derive from have an named . ただし、これらのコレクションが [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]で設定されている場合、コレクション内の項目は、ダイレクト オブジェクトではなく、 の派生クラスである必要があります。However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. これは、 が既定のパブリックコンストラクターをサポートしていないためです。This is because does not support a default public constructor. したがって、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] で設定された の項目は、通常、 や などの既定のパブリックコンストラクターをサポートする 派生クラスになります。Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples 次の例では、 を作成し、に関連付けます。The following example creates a and associates it with a . が の に追加されます。The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

[!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] の例では、文字どおり を使用しませんが、 はコレクションに対する [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 処理のサポートによって暗黙的に呼び出されます。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] example does not literally use , but is called implicitly by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing support for collections. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] とコレクションの詳細については、「 [XAML の概要 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)」を参照してください。For details on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and collections, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
